crypto.name: Garbled Guesses
crypto.desc:
VincBreaker, Trayshar

Did you ever dream of a crypto challenge on Yao's Garbled Circuits? Dream no more!

crypto.name: Hangar Heist
crypto.desc:
VincBreaker, Euph0r14

We found Captain Ciphers spaceship the Crypto Voyager! It carries a very valuable cargo of intergalactic supplies. Sadly Captain Cipher quickly shut the hangar doors when we got too close and we didn't bring our drill. Luckily for us, we managed to tap into the exposed hangar maintenance interface and our inside man dumped the door logic for us. If you can open the hangar door, we will double you share!

crypto.name: PyLit
crypto.desc:
doriankoch

Rick's knowledge is substantial, can you stand up to his challenge? Connect to the service and solve Rick's riddle to obtain the flag.

misc.name: Ghostbusters
misc.desc:
Romern

Do you ain't afraid of no ghosts?

osint.name: AC Hell
osint.desc:
doriankoch

I made this important recording near 50.780994, 6.050629 at some point during this year, but I forgot when exactly. Can you help me find out when I made it?

The flag is the seconds since epoch (UTC) when I started recording, in the format haix{<epoch_time>}. For example, if the time was 2025-11-29 10:00:00 (CET), the flag would be haix{1764406800}.

osint.name: Cool Lamppost
osint.desc:
Euph0r14

I found this really cool lamppost. Can you?

Flag format is the lamppost coordinates rounded to the fourth decimal space

Example, this signpost: 50°46'35.6"N 6°05'01.3"E 50.776564, 6.083705

Would become:

haix{50.7765_6.0837}

osint.name: Tiny Blahaj lost and looking for help
osint.desc:
Tschotsch

A tiny Blåhaj, curious and adventurous, decided one sunny morning to see the world. Spontaneously, it hopped into a bright green bus, thrilled by the possibilities ahead. As the vehicle rattled along unfamiliar streets, the little shark looked out the window, wondering where it might have ended up. Then, through the glass, it spotted a familiar station—the police! Blåhaj knew immediately: here were its friends and helpers. Relief washed over it, but the question remained: exactly where had it landed? The flag is haix{city_policestation} (i.e. haix{atlantis_polizeiwache_schwertwal}).

pwn.desc:
resedagrün

I built a little game to play in a shell, wanna try?

pwn.name: Backdoored
pwn.desc:
Trayshar

We recently fired one of our developers due to suspicious activities. However, we suspect that they might have left a backdoor in our key-value store that powers our entire backend. Are we just paranoid?

pwn.name: Cold Climate
pwn.desc:
MrSmör

Dont be jarred by avr :)

Welcome to Mini-Messenger: a secure chat with the best and most convenient 2FA on the market.

web.name: No Internet for You
web.desc:
vincentscode

Who needs the internet when you have a perfectly fine flag? You wouldn't want to share it with the world, would you?
